miruken.name: miruken
miruken.description: Package containing enhancements to the javascript language.

ioc.name: ioc
ioc.description:
Package providing Inversion-of-Control capabilities.
Requires the {{#crossLinkModule "miruken"}}{{/crossLinkModule}}, {{#crossLinkModule "callback"}}{{/crossLinkModule}}, {{#crossLinkModule "context"}}{{/crossLinkModule}} and {{#crossLinkModule "validate"}}{{/crossLinkModule}} modules.

mvc.name: mvc
mvc.description:
Package providing Model-View-Controller abstractions.
Requires the {{#crossLinkModule "miruken"}}{{/crossLinkModule}}, {{#crossLinkModule "callback"}}{{/crossLinkModule}}, {{#crossLinkModule "context"}}{{/crossLinkModule}} and {{#crossLinkModule "validate"}}{{/crossLinkModule}} modules.

validate.name: validate
validate.description:
Package providing validation support.
Requires the {{#crossLinkModule "miruken"}}{{/crossLinkModule}} and {{#crossLinkModule "callback"}}{{/crossLinkModule}} modules.

callback.name: callback
callback.description:
Package providing message handling support.
Requires the {{#crossLinkModule "miruken"}}{{/crossLinkModule}} module.

context.name: context
context.description:
Package providing contextual support.
Requires the {{#crossLinkModule "miruken"}}{{/crossLinkModule}}, {{#crossLinkModule "graph"}}{{/crossLinkModule}} and {{#crossLinkModule "callback"}}{{/crossLinkModule}} modules.

error.name: error
error.description:
Package providing generalized error support.
Requires the {{#crossLinkModule "miruken"}}{{/crossLinkModule}} and {{#crossLinkModule "callback"}}{{/crossLinkModule}} modules.

miruken.ioc.$.name: miruken.ioc.$
miruken.ioc.$.description:
Package providing Inversion-of-Control capabilities.
Requires the {{#crossLinkModule "miruken"}}{{/crossLinkModule}}, {{#crossLinkModule "callback"}}{{/crossLinkModule}}, {{#crossLinkModule "context"}}{{/crossLinkModule}} and {{#crossLinkModule "validate"}}{{/crossLinkModule}} modules.

miruken.ioc.Installer.name: miruken.ioc.Installer
miruken.ioc.Installer.description:
Base class for installing one or more components into a 
{{#crossLink "miruken.ioc.Container"}}{{/crossLink}}.

miruken.ioc.FromBuilder.name: miruken.ioc.FromBuilder
miruken.ioc.FromBuilder.description: Fluent builder for specifying source of components.

miruken.ioc.FromPackageBuilder.name: miruken.ioc.FromPackageBuilder
miruken.ioc.FromPackageBuilder.description: Fluent builder for specifying a Package as a source of components.

miruken.ioc.BasedOnBuilder.name: miruken.ioc.BasedOnBuilder
miruken.ioc.BasedOnBuilder.description: Fluent builder for filtering a source of components.

miruken.ioc.KeyBuilder.name: miruken.ioc.KeyBuilder
miruken.ioc.KeyBuilder.description: Fluent builder for identifying component key(s).

miruken.ioc.$container.name: miruken.ioc.$container
miruken.ioc.$container.description:
Modifier to request container dependency.
See {{#crossLink "miruken.ioc.Container"}}{{/crossLink}}

miruken.ioc.Registration.name: miruken.ioc.Registration
miruken.ioc.Registration.description: Protocol for registering components in a {{#crossLink "miruken.ioc.Container"}}{{/crossLink}}.

miruken.ioc.ComponentPolicy.name: miruken.ioc.ComponentPolicy
miruken.ioc.ComponentPolicy.description: Protocol for applying policies to a {{#crossLink "miruken.ioc.ComponentModel"}}{{/crossLink}}

miruken.ioc.DependencyInspector.name: miruken.ioc.DependencyInspector
miruken.ioc.DependencyInspector.description: Extracts dependencies from a component model.

miruken.ioc.ComponentModel.name: miruken.ioc.ComponentModel
miruken.ioc.ComponentModel.description: Describes a component to be managed by a {{#crossLink "miruken.ioc.Container"}}{{/crossLink}}.

miruken.ioc.Lifestyle.name: miruken.ioc.Lifestyle
miruken.ioc.Lifestyle.description: Manages the creation and destruction of components.

miruken.ioc.TransientLifestyle.name: miruken.ioc.TransientLifestyle
miruken.ioc.TransientLifestyle.description: Lifestyle for creating new untracked component instances.

miruken.ioc.SingletonLifestyle.name: miruken.ioc.SingletonLifestyle
miruken.ioc.SingletonLifestyle.description: Lifestyle for managing a single instance of a component.

miruken.ioc.ContextualLifestyle.name: miruken.ioc.ContextualLifestyle
miruken.ioc.ContextualLifestyle.description: Lifestyle for managing instances scoped to a {{#crossLink "miruken.context.Context"}}{{/crossLink}}.

miruken.ioc.DependencyResolution.name: miruken.ioc.DependencyResolution
miruken.ioc.DependencyResolution.description:
Specialized {{#crossLink "miruken.callback.Resolution"}}{{/crossLink}}
that maintains a parent relationship for representing resolution chains.

miruken.mvc.Model.name: miruken.mvc.Model

miruken.validate.$.name: miruken.validate.$
miruken.validate.$.description:
Package providing validation support.
Requires the {{#crossLinkModule "miruken"}}{{/crossLinkModule}} and {{#crossLinkModule "callback"}}{{/crossLinkModule}} modules.

miruken.validate.Validation.name: miruken.validate.Validation
miruken.validate.Validation.description: Callback representing the validation of an object.

miruken.validate.ValidationCallbackHandl.name: miruken.validate.ValidationCallbackHandler
miruken.validate.ValidationCallbackHandl.description:
CallbackHandler for performing validation.

Once an object is validated, it will receive a **$validation** property containing the validation results.

miruken.validate.$registerValidators.name: miruken.validate.$registerValidators

miruken.validate.ValidationRegistry.name: miruken.validate.ValidationRegistry

miruken.validate.ValidateJsCallbackHandl.name: miruken.validate.ValidateJsCallbackHandler

miruken.callback.$callbacks.name: miruken.callback.$callbacks

miruken.callback.HandleMethod.name: miruken.callback.HandleMethod
miruken.callback.HandleMethod.description: Captures the invocation of a method.

miruken.callback.Lookup.name: miruken.callback.Lookup
miruken.callback.Lookup.description: Callback representing the invariant lookup of a key.

miruken.callback.Deferred.name: miruken.callback.Deferred
miruken.callback.Deferred.description: Callback representing the deferred handling of another callback.

miruken.callback.Resolution.name: miruken.callback.Resolution
miruken.callback.Resolution.description: Callback representing the covariant resolution of a key.

miruken.callback.CallbackHandler.name: miruken.callback.CallbackHandler
miruken.callback.CallbackHandler.description:
Base class for handling arbitrary callbacks.
See {{#crossLink "miruken.callback.$callbacks"}}{{/crossLink}}

miruken.callback.CallbackHandlerDecorato.name: miruken.callback.CallbackHandlerDecorator
miruken.callback.CallbackHandlerDecorato.description:
Base class for all CallbackHandler decorators.
See [Decorator Pattern](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Decorator_pattern)

miruken.callback.ReentrantScope.name: miruken.callback.ReentrantScope
miruken.callback.ReentrantScope.description: Marks all handled callbacks as reentrant and continues processing.

miruken.callback.CallbackHandlerFilter.name: miruken.callback.CallbackHandlerFilter
miruken.callback.CallbackHandlerFilter.description: Represents a {{#crossLink "miruken.callback.CallbackHandler"}}{{/crossLink}} that can filter callbacks.

miruken.callback.RejectedError.name: miruken.callback.RejectedError
miruken.callback.RejectedError.description:
Identifies a rejected callback. This usually occurs from aspect processing.
See {{#crossLink "miruken.callback.CallbackHandlerAspect"}}{{/crossLink}}

miruken.callback.CallbackHandlerAspect.name: miruken.callback.CallbackHandlerAspect
miruken.callback.CallbackHandlerAspect.description:
Represents a {{#crossLink "miruken.callback.CallbackHandler"}}{{/crossLink}}
that can apply pre/post actions.

miruken.callback.ConditionalCallbackHand.name: miruken.callback.ConditionalCallbackHandler
miruken.callback.ConditionalCallbackHand.description:
{{#crossLink "miruken.callback.CallbackHandler"}}{{/crossLink}}
that tests a condition before handling callbacks.

miruken.callback.MethodCallbackHandler.name: miruken.callback.MethodCallbackHandler
miruken.callback.MethodCallbackHandler.description:
Shortcut for exposing a method as a
{{#crossLink "miruken.callback.CallbackHandler"}}{{/crossLink}}.

miruken.callback.InvocationDelegate.name: miruken.callback.InvocationDelegate
miruken.callback.InvocationDelegate.description:
Delegates properties and methods to a callback handler using 
{{#crossLink "miruken.callback.HandleMethod"}}{{/crossLink}}.

miruken.context.ContextObserver.name: miruken.context.ContextObserver
miruken.context.ContextObserver.description:
Protocol for observing the lifecycle of
{{#crossLink "miruken.context.Context"}}{{/crossLink}}.

miruken.context.Context.name: miruken.context.Context
miruken.context.Context.description:
A Context represents the scope at a give point in time.
It has a beginning and an end and can handle callbacks as well as notify observers of lifecycle changes.
In addition, it maintains parent-child relationships and thus can participate in a hierarchy.

miruken.context.Contextual.name: miruken.context.Contextual
miruken.context.Contextual.description:
Protocol to provide the minimal functionality to support contextual based operations.
This is an alternatve to the delegate model of communication, but with less coupling and ceremony.

miruken.context.$contextual.name: miruken.context.$contextual

miruken.error.Errors.name: miruken.error.Errors
miruken.error.Errors.description: Protocol for handling and reporting errors.

miruken.graph.Traversing.name: miruken.graph.Traversing
miruken.graph.Traversing.description: Protocol for traversing an abitrary graph of objects.

miruken.graph.Traversal.name: miruken.graph.Traversal
miruken.graph.Traversal.description: Helper class for traversing a graph.

miruken.$.name: miruken.$
miruken.$.description: Package containing enhancements to the javascript language.

miruken.Enum.name: miruken.Enum
miruken.Enum.description:
Defines an enumeration. 
   var Color = Enum({
       red:   1,
       green: 2,
       blue:  3
   })

miruken.Delegate.name: miruken.Delegate
miruken.Delegate.description:
Delegates properties and methods to another object.
See {{#crossLink "miruken.Protocol"}}{{/crossLink}}

miruken.ObjectDelegate.name: miruken.ObjectDelegate
miruken.ObjectDelegate.description: Delegates properties and methods to an obejct.

miruken.Protocol.name: miruken.Protocol

miruken.MetaMacro.name: miruken.MetaMacro
miruken.MetaMacro.description: Provides a method to modify a class definition at runtime.

miruken.$proxyProtocol.name: miruken.$proxyProtocol
miruken.$proxyProtocol.description:
Metamacro to proxy protocol methods through a delegate.
See {{#crossLink "miruken.Protocol"}}{{/crossLink}}

miruken.StrictProtocol.name: miruken.StrictProtocol
miruken.StrictProtocol.description: Protocol base requiring conformance to match methods.

miruken.$properties.name: miruken.$properties

miruken.$inferProperties.name: miruken.$inferProperties
miruken.$inferProperties.description:
Metamacro to derive class properties from existng methods.

Currently getFoo, isFoo and setFoo conventions are recognized.

   var Person = Base.extend(**$inferProperties**, {
       getName: function () { return this._name; },
       setName: function (value) { this._name = value; },
   })
would create a Person.name property bound to getName and setName

miruken.$inhertStatic.name: miruken.$inhertStatic

miruken.Miruken.name: miruken.Miruken
miruken.Miruken.description:
Base class to prefer coercion over casting.
By default, Type(target) will cast target to the type.

miruken.Disposing.name: miruken.Disposing
miruken.Disposing.description: Protocol for targets that manage disposal lifecycle.

miruken.Invoking.name: miruken.Invoking
miruken.Invoking.description: Protocol for targets that can execute functions.

miruken.Parenting.name: miruken.Parenting
miruken.Parenting.description: Protocol for targets that have parent/child relationships.

miruken.Starting.name: miruken.Starting
miruken.Starting.description: Protocol for targets that can be started.

miruken.ArrayManager.name: miruken.ArrayManager
miruken.ArrayManager.description: Helper class to simplify array manipulation.

miruken.IndexedList.name: miruken.IndexedList
miruken.IndexedList.description:
Maintains a simple doublely-linked list with indexing.
Indexes are partially ordered according to the order comparator.

miruken.InterceptorSelector.name: miruken.InterceptorSelector
miruken.InterceptorSelector.description: Responsible for selecting which interceptors to apply to a method.

classitems.name:
_instrumentScopes
Instruments angular scopes with miruken contexts.

_registerControllersAndDirectives
Registers the package controllers and directives.

_installPackage
Registers the package Installers, Runners and Starters.

Shim
Resolves the component from the container.

_provideLiteral
Provides all keys from the object literal.

_provideInjector
Attaches the supplied injector to owners $providers.

_ngDependencies
Extracts the string dependencies for the component.
